encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

keywords.term: Mythographus Homericus; commentary on Ilias, quoting 013.302, 459; 014.319; 015.229

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Text corrected as requested in vote.
Finalized - Text corrected as requested in vote.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - l. 2 [ca.13], l. 3 [ca.8], underdot below first eta. ]ρος L. 4 replace VRS with ed pr., .1 before phi L. 11 [.7] line end: *filler(doubleSlash)* L. 12 add ancient diacritics. L. 14 end [.0-1] L. 17 regularize text L. 18 add accents to unregularized text L. 19 last underdot below sigma L. 21 no lines lost at the end of this col.; second col.: renumber lines; L. 1 [.0-1], L. 2 [.1], [.1] -> [.0-1], delete apostroph, L. 4 delete first .?, final sigma, L. 6 add accents to unregularized text, underdot below gamma, L. 7 underdot below alpha, L. 8 add ancient interpunction, after L. 14 diple, no lines lost. L. 15 χερσι corrected to χειρεϲϲι by a second hand, L. 18 add ancient diacriticals L. 19 add accents to unregularized text, L. 20 .1 before rho

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - l. 2 [ca.13], l. 3 [ca.8], underdot below first eta. ]ρος L. 4 replace VRS with ed pr., .1 before phi L. 11 [.7] line end: *filler(doubleSlash)* L. 12 add ancient diacritics. L. 14 end [.0-1] L. 17 regularize text L. 18 add accents to unregularized text L. 19 last underdot below sigma L. 21 no lines lost at the end of this col.; second col.: renumber lines; L. 1 [.0-1], L. 2 [.1], [.1] -> [.0-1], delete apostroph, L. 4 delete first .?, final sigma, L. 6 add accents to unregularized text, underdot below gamma, L. 7 underdot below alpha, L. 8 add ancient interpunction, after L. 14 diple, no lines lost. L. 15 χερσι corrected to χειρεϲϲι by a second hand, L. 18 add ancient diacriticals L. 19 add accents to unregularized text, L. 20 .1 before rho

bibl.title: Studies in the Text and Transmission of the Iliad.

listBibl.bibl: L. del Corso - O. Pecere, Libri di scuola e pratiche didattiche, Convegno Cassino, 2010, Tav. 8
